title: Bourbon Salted Caramel Brownies
instructions: Melt butter. Stir in sugar. Beat in eggs, one at a time. Add cocoa, flour, salt, and vanilla. Pour into greased 9x13 pan. Bake at 350° for 25-30 minutes. For caramel: Cook sugar over medium heat until amber. Remove from heat. Carefully whisk in butter, then cream and bourbon. Pour over warm brownies. Sprinkle with sea salt. Cool completely before cutting.
